# Software {#Software}

macOSで有益なソフトウェアのリストです。

## Software {#Software}

### 必須 {#essential}

- バックグラウンドで動作
  + [Dropbox](https://www.dropbox.com/)
  + [Little Snitch](https://www.obdev.at/products/littlesnitch/)

- 入力支援
  + [ATOK](https://atok.com/)
  + [PopClip](https://pilotmoon.com/popclip/)
    - [PopClip Extensions](http://pilotmoon.com/popclip/extensions/)
    - [PopMaker](https://brettterpstra.com/2014/05/12/popmaker-popclip-extension-generator/)
  + [TextExpander](https://textexpander.com/)

- 日常的に有益
  + [Gestimer](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/gestimer-for-those-little/id990588172)
  + [Amphetamine](https://apps.apple.com/jp/app/amphetamine/id937984704)
  + [Pure Paste](https://sindresorhus.com/pure-paste)
  + [SlidePilot](https://slidepilotapp.com/en/)
  + [Bartender](https://www.macbartender.com/)
  + [SiteSucker](https://itunes.apple.com/jp/app/sitesucker/id442168834)

- もし開発が終了すると困る
  + [TeXShop](https://pages.uoregon.edu/koch/texshop/)
  + [Homebrew](https://brew.sh/)
  + [R](https://cran.r-project.org/)
  + [RStudio](https://www.rstudio.com/)
  + [Zotero](https://www.zotero.org/)
    - [Papers](http://www.mekentosj.com/papers/)の代わりとして使い始めた。
    - Source Folder for Attaching New Files: ~/Dropbox/Zotero
    - Location of Files: ~/Dropbox/Zotero
    - Use subfolder defined by "/%T/%w/%y"
    - Renaming Format: Format for all Types except Patents: "{%a }{(%y) }{%t}"
    - Add suffix when authors are omitted " et al."
  + [Scrivener](https://itunes.apple.com/jp/app/scrivener/id418889511)
  + [OmniFocus](https://itunes.apple.com/jp/app/omnifocus/id402835630)
  + [OmniGraffle](https://www.omnigroup.com/omnigraffle)
  + [OmniOutliner](https://www.omnigroup.com/omnioutliner)
  + [OBS Studio](https://obsproject.com/)
  + [VMware Fusion](http://www.vmware.com/products/fusion/overview.html)
    - Apple silicon非対応のため，実質的に使えない
